about_the_game:
SlovSurvial is a heart-pumping zombie survival game set on a biomechanical fantasy island that's been overrun by the undead. With a round-based structure and static objectives to support you, see how far you can outlast the ever-increasing hordes of zombies and mutants with your arsenal of upgradeable weapons.

You play as part of a crack team of professionals hired by a corporation to uncover the secrets of a research facility that went dark six years ago. As you parachute onto the abandoned island, you realize the horror that awaits you as the team encounters a variety of terrifying zombies and mutants.

Featuring intense, action-packed gameplay with a heavy impact, SlovSurvial offers high replayability as you strive to survive round after round against increasingly difficult foes. The game includes a dynamic event system, which challenges you to defend a drill for bonus points and progress towards the static objectives.

The game's organic movement AI ensures that each zombie feels distinct and unpredictable, while the upgradeable weapons system adds a new basic fire function to your primary and secondary weapon slots. The drill system allows you to extract resources to construct new weapons and upgrades to help you survive.

With a vibrant color scheme, a mix of sci-fi and biomechanical elements, and abandoned tech scattered across a tropical island, SlovSurvial offers a unique anime-inspired visual style that sets it apart from other survival games.

Are you ready to face the horde? Can you outlast the mutant monstrosities? Find out in SlovSurvial, the ultimate zombie survival game.

Features:

Intense and action-packed gameplay with heavy impacts
Third-person camera perspective
Round-based zombie survival mode with high replayability
Static objectives to help support players in their survival efforts
Point system for tracking progress and rewards
Organic movement AI for a more realistic and unpredictable gameplay experience
Event system featuring defending drills for bonus points and progress towards static objectives
Zombie enemies with biomechanical and mutating characteristics that evolve over time
Upgradeable weapons with new basic fire functions for added versatility and power
Primary and secondary weapon slots for custom load-outs
Singleplayer gameplay for maximum immersion and focus
Fantasy/sci-fi/biomechanical art style with vibrant color schemes and anime-inspired character designs
Abandoned tech facilities and metal scraps in a tropical island setting for a unique and immersive environment
Geometrical shape weapons for a distinctive and memorable look
Keyboard and mouse interface for intuitive and precise control
